# pscoupe

```
coupe(cmd0::String="", arg1=nothing; kwargs...)
```

Plot cross-sections of focal mechanisms.

See full GMT docs at [`pscoupe`](http://docs.generic-mapping-tools.org/latest/coupe.html). Essentially the same as **meca** plus **A**. Run `gmthelp(coupe)` to see the list of options.



```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
using GMT
GMT.doc_source_links("pscoupe")
```
